title: Paradise
description: NOTE- I designed this with -ALTDEATH in mind, but it should still be fun in normal mode. This WAD is the culmination of everything that my victims .. uh, I mean my friends and I wanted to see in a DEATHMATCH level. Lots of running room, large open circular rooms with wide twisty halls connecting them. Great sniping positions, and many LURKING spots. (I am a lurker at heart) There are no "safe" spots, no matter where you are you can be snuck up on. Everyone gets the shotgun and chaingun right ...
